name: Alice fell to Neverland - DEMO
description:
Alice Fell to Neverland is a indie horror RPG project made by me, King Hamster! 

It's currenly only a DEMO, but I'm actively working on making it a big project with a fully fleshed story. 

Current game version: DEMO. 0.2

Current game lenght:  Around 1 hour.

STORY 🐇

Caroline and Lewis are two 14 year-old students at St. Mary's Boarding School, who have fallen into a deep hole in the middle of the forest. With no way to climb out, the only clue they have to return is a strange white rabbit.

Finish puzzles, find your way home and learn the truth behind the dark place you've stumbled upon. 

Are you the one destined to fulfill the role of Alice? 

WARNING 🧚‍♀️

The following game may contain content that can be disturbing to some viewers! Viewer discretion is advised! For content warnings, please read the WARNING document included in the files. Thank you.

For updates, questions and comments please visit: https://alicefelltoneverland.tumblr.com/

You might need RPG Maker VX Ace RTP, get it here <3 https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package

Remember to install the font on the FONT folder for best experience.

Currently working on: CAROLINE SIDE, FULL RELEASE

Thank you for reading!
